mapper.insert: insert into AF_EXAM_LIST (EXAM_ID, NAME, TOTAL_SCORE, TOTAL_COUNT, SHOWFLAG, INTENSIFYFLAG, CREATE_TIME,ISEXAM,EXAM_START,EXAM_END,EXAM_DURATION,EXAM_TYPE) values (#{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intensifyflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isexam,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{examStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{examEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{examDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{examType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update AF_EXAM_LIST set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_SCORE = #{totalScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_COUNT = #{totalCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWFLAG = #{showflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTENSIFYFLAG = #{intensifyflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISEXAM = #{isexam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXAM_START = #{examStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXAM_END = #{examEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXAM_DURATION = #{examDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXAM_TYPE = #{examType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EXAM_ID, NAME, TOTAL_SCORE, TOTAL_COUNT, SHOWFLAG, INTENSIFYFLAG, CREATE_TIME,ISEXAM,EXAM_START,EXAM_END,EXAM_DURATION,EXAM_TYPE from AF_EXAM_LIST t where t.showflag = 1 order by t.intensifyflag desc, t.exam_id
select t.name from AF_EXAM_LIST t where t.exam_id = #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1.EXAM_ID, t1.NAME, t1.TOTAL_SCORE, t1.TOTAL_COUNT, t1.SHOWFLAG, t1.INTENSIFYFLAG, t1.CREATE_TIME,t1.ISEXAM,t1.EXAM_START,t1.EXAM_END,t1.EXAM_DURATION,t1.EXAM_TYPE,t2.TIMES as EXAM_TIMES from AF_EXAM_LIST t1 left join (select EXAM_ID,count(*) as TIMES from AF_USER_EXAM_HISTORY where TELNUM=#{telnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=1 group by EXAM_ID) t2 on t1.EXAM_ID = t2.EXAM_ID where t1.SHOWFLAG = '1'
